channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Adobe faces class action lawsuit after allegedly misusing authors work in AI training
item.description: Oregon author is proposing a class action lawsuit against Adobe for pirating books to train its SlimLM small language models.

item.title: Europol imagines robot crime waves in 2035
item.description: Rapid advances in AI and robotics are set to become both powerful tools for police and potent weapons for criminals, a 48-page report from pan-European police agency Europol argues. Earlier this month, Europol's Innovation Lab published "The Unmanned Future(s): The impact of robotics and unmanned systems on law enforcement." The document is framed as more […]...

item.title: The best board games to gift and play with the family for the 2025 holiday season
item.description:
It's become cliche to say that we live in a golden age of board games, but to paraphrase the great stoic philosopher Andy Bernard, it's great to know you're in the good old days before you've left them. Great titles are still coming out by the thousands every year, from crowd-pleasing party games to genre-bending, theme-heavy Euros. Whether the gamer in your life is looking for a mind-warping challenge, a fun evening with friends or something in-between, we've got new releases or old favorites they'll love. Best board games to gift (and play) this holiday season
Che...

item.title: 15 millions de voitures produites : BYD écrase tout sur son passage, mais un détail change la donne
item.description: BYD vient d’annoncer avoir atteint la barre des 15 millions de voitures électrifiées produites à travers le monde, dépassant Tesla et Volkswagen. Mais attention à un petit détail.

item.title: L’iPhone pliant d’Apple prend forme à travers de premières images non officielles
item.description: En se basant sur des fichiers CAD avancés comme officiels, un site allemand a publié des premières images de l’iPhone Fold qui révèlent un format audacieux et inédit. Plus large que ses rivaux en mode plié (120,6 x 83,8 x 9,6 mm), il s’ouvrirait en paysage sur un écran interne de 7,76 pouces, avec barre photo ovale et caméra sous l'écran.

item.title: The wellness wild west is back on its bullshit with unapproved weight loss drugs
item.description: This is Optimizer, a weekly newsletter sent every Friday from Verge senior reviewer Victoria Song that dissects and discusses the latest phones, smartwatches, apps, and other gizmos that swear they're going to change your life. Optimizer will be taking a break for the holidays and will be back January 9th. Opt in for Optimizer here. […]

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Saturday, December 20 (game #1426)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Saturday, December 20 (game #923)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Saturday, December 20 (game #657)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: 7 new movies and TV shows to watch on Netflix, Prime Video, HBO Max, and more this weekend (December 19)
item.description: TechRadar's pre-Christmas 2025 streaming round-up is full of new movies and shows, a comedy special, and a live sport event.

item.title: Une Tesla Model S au prix d’une Model 3 : Xpeng serait sur le point de lancer sa voiture électrique avec 700 km d’autonomie et une recharge en 12 minutes en Europe
item.description: Dévoilée en 2024, la Xpeng P7+ aura bientôt le droit à une nouvelle génération qui devrait débarquer en Europe. La berline électrique devrait être dévoilée le 8 janvier 2026, et voilà ce que l’on sait déjà à son sujet.

item.title: Percy Jackson season 3 is ‘well underway’ and creator Rick Riordan teases a major role: ‘it’s pretty amazing casting’
item.description: Percy Jackson and the Olympians season 2 has just arrived on Disney+, but creator Rick Riordan is already looking forward to season 3.

item.title: A robot just learned 1,000 tasks in a single day — and it’s a big deal for everyday AI
item.description: This robot was able to learn 1,000 tasks in just 24 hours - but why should you care?

item.title: Krafton hikes India bet with new $670M fund
item.description: Called the Unicorn Growth Fund, the investment vehicle is a collaboration between Krafton and South Korean internet conglomerate Naver, and investor Mirae Asset. It aims to deploy around $669.3 million over four years.

item.title: Brendan Carr is a dummy
item.description: All year on The Vergecast, we've been tracking the many bizarre and problematic actions of FCC Chairman Brendan Carr. There has been a lot to discuss! Then, this week, ahead of one of our last episodes of the year, Carr appeared in front of the Senate Commerce Committee and spent three hours explaining how he […]

item.title: Google va vous aider à identifier les vidéos générées par IA, mais il y a un hic
item.description: Google améliore les capacités de son outil de détection de contenus fait par IA. Une bonne idée pourtant limitée par un point crucial.

item.title: Une première pour contrer les tricheurs : Valorant sera injouable sans cette mise à jour critique qui pourrait rebuter les joueurs
item.description: Valorant va bientôt exiger des joueurs qu'ils mettent à jour leur BIOS, sous peine de ne plus pouvoir accéder au jeu. Une première.

item.title: The Best Cookbooks of 2025: Soju Party, Good Things, Salsa Daddy, Linger, and More
item.description: This year’s bumper crop looks at salsa, salads, drinking culture, home baking, and Italian cuisine.

item.title: Engadget Podcast: 2025 was the year of AI, smartglasses and spineless Big Tech
item.description: This week, Engadget Managing Editor Cherlynn Low joins us to look back at some of the highlights (and lowlights) of 2025. We dive into our favorite gadgets of the year, the many ways Big Tech bowed to Trump, the disappointment of AI PCs and the rise of smart glasses. We also learn way too much about our skincare routines.Subscribe!iTunesSpotifyPocket CastsStitcherGoogle PodcastsTopicsOur favorite gadgets of 2025: Kindle Scribe Colorsoft, Airpods Pro 3, bluetooth lav mics and more – 2:26Favorite Media of 2025: Andor, self-improvement via podcast, and a shoutout to your library – 34:30iRobot dec...

item.title: REDMAGIC 10 Air : le roi des smartphones gaming de milieu de gamme perd plus de 110 € de son prix
item.description: Plus abordable que la version Pro, le Redmagic 10 Air n'est pas avare en performances puisque grâce au Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, il permet de jouer aux plus gros jeux disponibles. Chez AliExpress, il passe de 499 euros à 385,92 euros.

item.title: MasterClass deal: Get 50 percent off subscriptions for the holidays
item.description:
If learning a new skill is one of your New Year's resolutions, then you might want to know that MasterClass subscriptions are currently 50 percent off. This brings the top-tier subscription with offline mode and use on up to six devices down from $240 annually to $120. The entry-level plan, which supports just one device and doesn't offer offline viewing, is marked down to $60 from $120.
Over the past few years, MasterClass has grown to over 200 classes, sessions and original series. You can learn about entrepreneurship from Richard Branson, screenwriting from Aaron Sorkin, cooking from Gord...

item.title: Voitures électriques : ce qui va changer dès le 1er janvier pour les modèles chinois importés
item.description: De nombreux constructeurs automobiles vendent des voitures électriques d’occasion zéro-kilomètre. Une stratégie que veut désormais contrer le gouvernement chinois avec une nouvelle mesures concernant les exportations.

item.title: How to listen to BBC Radio 4 from anywhere in the world
item.description: Here's how to listen to BBC Radio 4 outside the UK, with and without BBC Sounds.

item.title: Shein : un revers pour le gouvernement, la justice rejette la demande de suspension du site
item.description: Ce vendredi 19 décembre, le tribunal judiciaire de Paris a décidé de ne pas suspendre Shein pendant trois mois, une demande de l'État formulée début novembre après le scandale des poupées gonflables pornographiques.

item.title: State actors are abusing OAuth device codes to get full M365 account access - here's what we know
item.description: Researchers spotted multiple groups using the same technique and believe it's only going to get worse.

item.title: Luigi Mangione’s pretrial hearing is over. Here’s what we learned about his UnitedHealthcare murder case
item.description: New details about his December 2024 arrest in Pennsylvania were revealed. A 911 call about a man resembling “the CEO shooter.” Body-camera footage of police arresting Luigi Mangione and pulling items from his backpack, including a gun that prosecutors say matches the one used to kill UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson, and a notebook they have described as a “manifesto.” Notes about a “survival kit” and “intel checkin,” and testimony about alleged statements behind bars.A three-week pretrial hearing on Mangione’s fight to exclude evidence from his New York murder case ended Thursday after rev...

item.title: Save over £300 on this Google Pixel 10 and Buds 2a bundle at Amazon
item.description: Amazon has a huge saving on this bundle featuring Google’s flagship Pixel 10 and some Buds 2a, bringing them down to £599.

item.title: Hacks, thefts and disruption: The worst data breaches of 2025
item.description: TechCrunch looks back at the biggest data breaches, disruptive cyberattacks, and damaging hacks of 2025, from the raiding of U.S. government databases to a hack every month in South Korea.

item.title: Automated Holiday Party Ideas (2025): Ninja, HP Sprocket, Cricut
item.description: I've tested smart home gear and high-tech party gadgets at every holiday party I've hosted so far this year. Here’s how to automate your party so you can actually enjoy the holiday season.

item.title: The best subscription box gifts for 2025
item.description: The best gifts inspire joy long after the initial unwrapping. Subscription boxes are designed to show up again and again, each time offering something new to try, build or taste. They’re perfect for friends who already have too much gear or relatives who like to discover things without searching for them. From electronics kits and mystery puzzles to Japanese treats and fresh coffee, these boxes make each month feel like a small celebration. You pick the vibe, the plan and the recipient gets a steady stream of good surprises. Below are 13 subscription boxes that hit the sweet spot between fun a...

item.title: Archie Comics Is Getting Another Reboot—But Not at Archie Comics
item.description: Just what the publisher's future plans look like right now remains unknown... because the future of Riverdale is now at Oni Press.

item.title: TechRadar Gaming’s Game of the Year list 2025: our top 20 games from this year
item.description: We’ve discussed all the awesome games of 2025 and come up with our top 20 list of the best of the year.

item.title: How to watch Jake Paul vs Anthony Joshua online: live stream boxing, fight card, ringwalks
item.description: All the ways to watch Jake Paul vs Anthony Joshua live streams online, as the pair clash in a heavyweight contest with 10oz gloves in Miami, Florida.

item.title: 'Epic' Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 4 fight scene changes the Gladiator game — and is unlike anything we've seen so far
item.description: The fighting has been bloody and brutal, but the 'epic' Spartacus: House of Ashur episode 4 closing scene changes everything we've learned so far.

item.title: My fave JBL Bluetooth speaker is cheaper than ever – making it a great last-minute Xmas gift
item.description: The JBL Charge 6 is one of my top Bluetooth speaker picks – and it’s now on sale for its lowest-ever price.

item.title: Christmas and New Year’s traffic is going to be a nightmare: These are the best and worst times to be on the road
item.description: AAA says a record number of Americans will travel over the holiday period this year. There are simple steps you can take to make your trip less stressful. With the last weekend before Christmas upon us, the holiday travel period has begun.

item.title: Cette ville suédoise a trouvé une étonnante manière d’utiliser les vieilles éoliennes
item.description: Construire des centrales éoliennes à tour de bras, c’est une chose. Mais encore faut-il pouvoir recycler leurs composants en fin de vie, au risque de voir ces équipements devenir un nouveau problème environnemental. Dans un projet suédois, les pales d’éoliennes désaffectées ornent les façades d’un parking.

item.title: Tech Billionaires Pledge $1 Billion to CERN for Future Circular Collider
item.description: The first phase of the Future Circular Collider wouldn't be completed until the 2040s.

item.title: OpenAI is reportedly trying to raise $100B at an $830B valuation
item.description: The ChatGPT maker is aiming to raise the funding by the end of the first quarter in 2026, and the company may ask sovereign wealth funds to invest in the round.

item.title: Best MacBooks (2025): Which Apple Laptop Should You Buy?
item.description: With prices at new lows and an incoming memory shortage, here's our advice on which MacBook you should buy.

item.title: Phones were fashionable again in 2025
item.description: A year or two ago, when a phone showed up at my door for review, I could pretty much count on it being black, gray, or maybe (as a treat) white. But in 2025, that hasn't been the case. Phones I reviewed this year featured everything from real wood grain back panels to deep blue […]
